plot outline: Vivek (Srikant) is married to the extremely jealous and suspicious Sandhya (Sangeeta). When she finds him behind closed doors with Tilottama (Jyoti), he proclaims her the wife of Subbu (Venu), their common friend, to save his own skin. Subbu plays along, but things get sticky when his own Tilottama shows up at Venu's engagement to his girlfriend (Rakshita). Remake of the Tamil hit Charlie Chaplin - the film has some good moments.
title: Pellam Oorelithe
plot: Two men pretend to be married to a prostitute to protect each other's marriages.

Vivek (Srikant) is married to the extremely jealous and suspicious Sandhya (Sangeeta). When she finds him behind closed doors with Tilottama (Jyoti), he proclaims her the wife of Subbu (Venu), their common friend, to save his own skin. Subbu plays along, but things get sticky when his own Tilottama shows up at Venu's engagement to his girlfriend (Rakshita). Remake of the Tamil hit Charlie Chaplin - the film has some good moments.::Joyojeet Pal
